short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows selecting text in New York Times online articles.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The New York Times website has JavaScript on its articles which prevent the user from selecting text, for example to copy it. This extension removes that restriction, so that text can be selected.
